rule: The "Company names:" section must appear first in the output before any other sections.

complianceText:

Then it follows with "People names" with "Elon Musk". The "Specific topics" list "Renewable energy markets, Interest shown by IBM and Tesla" and "General themes" list "Focus on sustainability, Renewable energy". Each section is separated by "-||-" as per the format requirement.

There are no observed violations of format or structure in the output. Therefore, the output complies with the description.

No violation.
OK
